title: About
content: [Me My name is Ryan. I am a content strategist, editor, writer, and web publisher in Chicago, IL. Friends have told me to write a blog for the last decade. I&rsquo;m just catching up. The Site Content All content for the site is written in clean, semantic markdown in observation of the latest commonmark spec. As a publisher, my intent is to create CMS-independent content that can be easily ported to any static site generator with support for markdown files with embedded yaml. Where markdown falls short, extensions to the syntax are rendered on the client through a handful of JavaScript modules and Hugo Shortcodes. Development All code used for this site is open source and hosted on GitHub.]

title: Contact
content: [If you have questions about the site, would like to share tips or feedback, or would like to discuss contract opportunities, please do not hesitate to contact me.]
